ygData.subject: Re: Qtn about Quest item
ygData.msgSnippet: The jumjum juice is not THAT rare. But you don t find it on all the bixies. The quest starts in RiverVale (Halflings), which is a zone or two from Freeport. I
ygData.messageBody:
The jumjum juice is not THAT rare. But you don't find it on all the bixies.
The quest starts in RiverVale (Halflings), which is a zone or two from
Freeport. I don't know exactly what the NPC name is but it is by the farm
(aka. Druid guild). And I'm not sure if it is a druid only quest.

Henning Seljenes

Irontoe (Xegony)

>hehe..been carrying one for a while now....puttin it in the vault. Got it
>off a Bixie in EC...guess its a druid quest item. If any of you druids on
>Fennin Ro need this gimme a tell...i'm in the Fay region. Also have a Shiny
>Lore Card and Rondo Tongue...I find these items useful for weight...hehe.
>Glad to give them away...just cluttering up the garage <smile>.
>
>Skyburst
>Fennin Ro
